name: css-pipeline
author: Jeff Escalante <hello@jenius.me>
description: roots extension for handling css production builds

scripts.coverage: make build; istanbul cover _mocha --report html -- -R spec && open coverage/index.html && make unbuild
scripts.coveralls: make build; istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage; make unbuild
